meanings.definition: The scientific study of trees and woody plants.
meanings.sent1: Dendrologies help us learn about different types of trees.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reading books about dendrologies in her free time.
meanings.sent3: The dendrologies expert could identify any tree blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the trees whispered secrets only dendrologies could understand.
meanings.sent5: His passion for dendrologies was evident in the way he cared for each tree.

meanings.definition: The collection and classification of information about trees and woody plants.
meanings.sent1: The library has a vast collection of dendrologies for research.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours organizing her dendrologies into different categories.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with dendrologies led to a beautifully organized tree database.
meanings.sent4: The dendrologies in the museum showcased the diversity of trees around the world.
meanings.sent5: Studying dendrologies requires attention to detail and patience.
